com.buschmais.xo.spi.datastore

Interface DatastoreSession<EntityId,Entity,EntityMetadata extends DatastoreEntityMetadata<EntityDiscriminator>,EntityDiscriminator,RelationId,Relation,RelationMetadata extends DatastoreRelationMetadata<RelationDiscriminator>,RelationDiscriminator,PropertyMetadata>

  • Type Parameters:
    EntityId - The type of entity ids used by the datastore.
    Entity - The type of entities used by the datastore.
    EntityDiscriminator - The type of entity discriminators used by the datastore.
    RelationId - The type of relation ids used by the datastore.
    Relation - The type of relations used by the datastore.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Neo4jDatastoreSession<GDS>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNeo4jDatastoreSession, EmbeddedNeo4jDatastoreSession, JsonDatastoreSession, RestNeo4jDatastoreSession, TraceDatastoreSession

    public interface DatastoreSession<EntityId,Entity,EntityMetadata extends DatastoreEntityMetadata<EntityDiscriminator>,EntityDiscriminator,RelationId,Relation,RelationMetadata extends DatastoreRelationMetadata<RelationDiscriminator>,RelationDiscriminator,PropertyMetadata>
    Defines the interface of a datastore session, e.g. a connection to the datastore.

    • Method Summary

      Return the instance of the datastore transaction associated with the session.
